title: Rehabilitation of flood survivors govt’s first priority: PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 4 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday said that the rehabilitation of the flood-affected people was the government’s first priority.
The prime minister, who was on his way to the flood-ravaged Sohbatpur city of Balochistan for a day-long visit, was briefed aboard by Chairman of National Disaster Management Authority Lt. General Inam Haider Malik on the ongoing reconstruction and rehabilitation works.
Minister for Housing and Works Maulana Abdul Wasay was accompanying the prime minister.
